news_header: Enterprises expect an average turnover growth of up to 8% this year, with positive prospects for small and medium-sized enterprises.
news_text: A survey by Finnish Industrial Investment Tes indicates that enterprises anticipate an average turnover growth of up to 8% for the current year. Small and medium-sized enterprises have particularly positive growth prospects, and large investments are becoming more frequent. Mr. Tes highlights a turning point in the outlook for industrial companies compared to last year, which was less favorable. The growth enterprise pulse study was conducted from October to January with nearly 1,500 respondents.
